text: Eastern Orthodox cross July 14 - Eastern Orthodox Church calendar - July 16 All fixed commemorations below are celebrated on July 28 by Old Calendar. For July 15th, Orthodox Churches on the Old Calendar commemorate the Saints listed on July 2. ==Saints== * Martyrs Cyricus (Quiricus) and his mother Julitta, of Tarsus (c. 305)July 15/July 28.
